abstract: Duncan P. Hennes, a former Bankers Trust and Soros Fund executive and a co-founder of the Promontory Financial Group, will join the board as an independent director.
snippet: Duncan P. Hennes, a former Bankers Trust and Soros Fund executive and a co-founder of the Promontory Financial Group, will join the board as an independent director.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup announced on Wednesday that Duncan P. Hennes, a longtime financial executive, would join its board.
